https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bqtPK4LHbuXwiHMlXwUD4hU4S2D.jpg The story of two Mennonite sisters who have left their strict religious upbringing behind. While one sibling struggles in love and life, the other is a world-famous concert pianist. All My Puny Sorrows
